mapper.select: select * from 工种情况 where 编号=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into 工种情况(编号,工种,等级,部门,基本工资) values(#{id},#{type},#{level},#{basic_salary})
mapper.delete: delete from 工种情况 where 编号=#{id}
mapper.update: update 工种情况 set 工种=#{type},等级=#{level},部门=#{department},基本工资=#{basic_salary} where 编号 = #{id}
